release_notes.en-GB: Adds support for join.skype.com and preview.web.skype.com, plus experimental Firefox for Android support.

description.en-GB: This extension is no longer necessary! Skype Web works without tweaks in Firefox now. Skype Web FF is an extension that allows you to use Skype Web in Firefox much like you would in Chrome, without altering how your browser behaves on other websites. This is accomplished by changing your browser's user agent to Chrome when visiting https://web.skype.com and any other eventual pages under the same domain, but leaves your user agent be when visiting other websites. In less technical terms, it tells Skype's website that you are using Chrome, while in reality you are using Firefox. which allows Skype Web to function in Firefox. It may, however, not work flawlessly, though chatting/texting, audio calls, and notifications have been verified to work at the time of writing. Bugs: Any bugs that occur when using Skype Web via this extension in Firefox, but not in Chrome, should be reported to the issue tracker found on GitLab, here: https://gitlab.com/Newbyte/skype-web-ff/issues Donations: I maintain and support this in my free time. Donations are very welcome, but are — and always will be — entirely optional: https://www.paypal.com/donate?hosted_button_id=2HTDTJ42UDNLG Note: Skype is a trademark of Microsoft Corporation. This extension is in no way related to Microsoft Corporation and they are in no way responsible for any bugs, glitches, or other misbehaviour that this extension may cause. Bugs that appear when using this in Firefox, but not in Chrome, should be reported as an issue on the GitLab repository linked, not to Microsoft.
description.sv-SE: Detta tillägg behövs inte längre! Skype Web fungerar utan webbläsartillägg i Firefox nu. Skype Web FF låter dig använda Skype Web i Firefox precis som du kan i Chrome, utan att ändra hur din webbläsare beter sig på andra webbsidor. Detta görs genom att ändra Firefox user agent till Chrome när du besöker https://web.skype.com och andra eventuella sidor under samma domän, men låter din user agent vara när du besöker andra domäner. Med andra ord så gör detta tillägg att Firefox låtsas vara Chrome när du besöker Skype:s webbsida, även fast du använder Firefox. Detta gör att Skype Web fungerar i Firefox. Det är inte garanterat att det kommer fungera perfekt, men vid skrivande stund kan jag bekräfta att chatta, röstsamtal, och notifikationer fungerar. Buggar: Buggar som uppstår när man använder Skype Web via detta tillägg i Firefox, men som inte uppstår i Chrome, bör rapporteras hit: https://gitlab.com/Newbyte/skype-web-ff/issues Donationer: Jag underhåller och ger support för detta tillägg under min fritid. Donationer uppskattas, men är och kommer alltid vara helt valfria: https://www.paypal.com/donate?hosted_button_id=2HTDTJ42UDNLG Note: Skype is a trademark of Microsoft Corporation. This extension is in no way related to Microsoft Corporation and they are in no way responsible for any bugs, glitches, or other misbehaviour that this extension may cause. Bugs that appear when using this in Firefox, but not in Chrome, should be reported as an issue on the GitLab repository linked, not to Microsoft.

summary.en-GB: Makes using Skype Web in Firefox a breeze, bypassing the "browser not supported" error.
summary.sv-SE: Makes using Skype Web in Firefox a breeze, bypassing the "browser not supported" error.
